item.title: 巴西国家石油公司股价因董事长将离职的报道而下跌
item.description: 三位熟悉内情的人士透露，巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）董事长彼得罗-门德斯（Pietro Mendes）将离开这家石油生产商，转而担任巴西石油监管机构的董事，这让投资者对该公司的分红政策感到不安。【原文：Petrobras Chairman Pietro Mendes will leave the oil producer to become a director at Brazil’s oil regulator, three people familiar with the matter said, leaving investors uneasy about the company’s dividend policy.】

item.title: 贝莱德的博文称全球债券比美国国债更受青睐
item.description: 贝莱德投资研究所（BlackRock Investment Institute）所长让-博文（Jean Boivin）认为，明年通胀将迫使美联储采取观望态度，投资者应青睐全球债券而非期限较长的美国国债。【原文：Investors should favor global bonds over longer-dated US Treasuries, with sticky inflation forcing the Federal Reserve to the sidelines next year, according to Jean Boivin, head of BlackRock Investment Institute.】

item.title: 法国政府垮台后，马克龙的宏伟计划毁于一旦
item.description:
这个国家从未如此接近勒庞政府，而这正是马克龙总统不惜一切代价要避免的。【原文：

The country has never been closer to a Le Pen administration — the one thing President Macron has sought to avoid at all costs.

】

item.title: 美国商品期货交易委员会（CFTC）打击加密货币的救济金达到创纪录的 171 亿美元
item.description: 美国商品期货交易委员会的罚款和投资者救济达到创纪录的 171 亿美元，这主要归功于该机构对已停业的加密货币交易所 FTX 的打击。【原文：The US Commodity Futures Trading Commission’s fines and investor relief hit a record $17.1 billion, largely due to the agency’s crackdown on defunct crypto exchange FTX.】

item.title: 巴尼耶政府倒台后法国债券期货保持涨势
item.description: 在极右翼领导人玛丽娜-勒庞加入左翼联盟推翻政府后，法国国债期货守住了早些时候的涨幅，这为进一步的政治争斗创造了条件，数月来的政治争斗已对法国资产造成了压力。【原文：French bond futures held onto earlier gains after far-right leader Marine Le Pen joined a left-wing coalition to topple the government, setting the stage for further political wrangling that has weighed on the nation’s assets for months.】

item.title: 美国最小企业的工资增长速度为两年来最快
item.description: 美国 ADP 研究所的数据显示，11 月份美国小型企业的工资增长速度自去年年初以来首次加快。【原文：Wage growth among the smallest US businesses accelerated in November for the first time since early last year, according to data from the ADP Research Institute.】

item.title: Amundi 有意收购安联全球投资公司
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Amundi SA 有意收购安联集团（Allianz SE）旗下资产管理公司安联全球投资公司（Allianz Global Investors）的控制权，因为这家法国公司正在行业整合中寻找交易机会。【原文：Amundi SA is interested in acquiring control of Allianz SE’s asset manager Allianz Global Investors as the French company scouts for deals amid industry consolidation, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 巴西法官裁定面临债务 "危机 "的咖啡出口商败诉
item.description: 巴西一名法官作出不利于主要咖啡出口商 Montesanto Tavares Group Participações SA 的裁决，该公司一直试图重新谈判欠银行和包括大宗商品贸易商嘉吉公司在内的公司的债务。【原文：A Brazilian judge ruled against major coffee exporter Montesanto Tavares Group Participações SA, which has been attempting to renegotiate debt owed to banks and firms including commodities trader Cargill Inc.】

item.title: 美联储《米色报告》显示企业对需求前景充满信心
item.description: 美联储在其最新的《米色手册》调查报告中称，11 月份经济活动略有增长，而此前几个月几乎没有变化，美国企业对需求前景更加乐观。【原文：Economic activity increased slightly in November after little change in preceding months, and US businesses grew more upbeat about demand prospects, the Federal Reserve said in its latest Beige Book survey.】

item.description:

item.title: 新一轮 "淘金热 "中一天内推出两只私人信贷 ETF
item.description: 首批两只持有私人信用贷款的交易所交易基金在同一天开始交易，发行商竞相利用投资界最热门的趋势之一。【原文：The first two exchange-traded funds to hold private credit loans began trading on the same day, with issuers racing to tap into one of the investing world’s hottest trends.】

item.title: 11 月加密货币交易量首次飙升至 10 万亿美元
item.description: 11 月份，加密货币交易量攀升至历史新高，集中式现货和衍生品交易所的数字资产交易量首次超过 10 万亿美元。【原文：Crypto trading volume climbed to an all-time high in November, with more than $10 trillion of digital assets changing hands for the first time on centralized spot and derivatives exchanges.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织内部监察机构批评其对最大贷款的处理方式
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，国际货币基金组织的内部监察机构批评了该机构向阿根廷和埃及等陷入困境的借款国发放异常大额贷款的程序。【原文：The International Monetary Fund’s internal watchdog has criticized the lender’s process for granting unusually large loans to troubled borrowers such as Argentina and Egypt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 苏格兰政府称债券发行物有所值
item.description: 苏格兰政府表示，在适当的市场条件下出售债券可以实现资金价值，为未来几年的首次发行铺平道路。【原文：Scotland’s government said that selling bonds in the right market conditions could offer value for money, paving the way for an inaugural issuance in the coming years.】

item.title: 分析师称 2025 年小额贷款销售额将突破 5000 亿美元
item.description: 市政债券银行家们应该为 2025 年更大的销售冲击做好准备，即使是在供应量大增的一年之后。【原文：Municipal bond bankers should prepare for a bigger onslaught of sales in 2025, even after a blockbuster year of supply.】

item.title: 康卡斯特称合同错字威胁其紧急呼叫服务
item.description: 康卡斯特公司（Comcast Corp. ）的一位官员告诉法官，他在审查十年前的一份合同时犯了一个错误，这份合同现在可能导致该公司的紧急呼叫服务过早关闭，危及医院病人、急救人员和 911 报警者。【原文：A Comcast Corp. official told a judge he made a mistake in reviewing a contract a decade ago that may now result in the premature shutdown of the company’s emergency-call services, endangering hospital patients, first responders and 911 callers.】

item.title: 雪花调查异常迅速地逮捕了嫌犯
item.description: 嗨，我是马吉。回想起雪花黑客，最让我印象深刻的是调查员们是如何迅速取得成果的。但首先...【原文：Hi, it’s Margi. When I think about the Snowflake hack, one of the most striking things to me is how quickly investigators got results. But first…】

item.title: 摩根大通、AT&T 在反犹太主义指控后撤下 Twitch 广告
item.description: 据知情人士透露，三大品牌已停止在亚马逊公司的 Twitch 在线服务上投放广告，因为一群有争议的直播者指控该公司正在推广反犹太主义内容。【原文：Three major brands have halted their advertising on Amazon.com Inc.’s Twitch online service, according to people with knowledge of the matter, after a controversial group of livestreamers alleged that the company is promoting antisemitic content.】

item.title: 加拿大油砂之乡追逐 710 亿美元数据中心商机
item.description: 加拿大阿尔伯塔省拥有世界第三大原油储量，该省正在努力成为人工智能数据中心的枢纽，并认为有潜力吸引 1000 亿加元（约合 710 亿美元）的投资。【原文：The Canadian province of Alberta, home to the world’s third-largest crude reserves, is making a push to become a hub for artificial intelligence data centers and sees the potential to attract C$100 billion ($71 billion) in investments.】

item.title: 拉加德表示，欧洲必须调整资本市场联盟工作的重点
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德在为《经济学人》撰写的专栏文章中说，欧盟需要加大力度统一其分散的金融基础设施。【原文：The European Union needs to ramp up efforts to unify its fragmented financial infrastructure, European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said in an op-ed for the Economist.】

item.title: 电动汽车公司 Ideanomics 在与美国证券交易委员会达成和解后申请破产
item.description: Ideanomics 公司拥有为电动公交车和其他商用车充电的技术，在证券监管机构指控其高管在财务业绩方面误导投资者数月后，该公司已申请破产。【原文：Ideanomics Inc., which owns technology used to charge electric buses and other commercial vehicles, has filed bankruptcy months after securities regulators accused its executives of misleading investors about its financial performance.】

item.title: 特朗普推选前证监会委员阿特金斯接替根斯勒
item.description: 保罗-阿特金斯（Paul Atkins）是一位资深的金融监管者，也是华盛顿保守派金融界的常客，他是当选总统唐纳德-特朗普领导美国证券交易委员会并可能对其进行全面改革的人选。【原文：Paul Atkins, a veteran financial regulator and a fixture in Washington’s conservative financial circles, is President-elect Donald Trump’s choice to lead and possibly overhaul the US Securities and Exchange Commission.】

item.title: 红宝石收益测试临近，企业关注数据安全支出
item.description: Rubrik 公司本周四发布的第三季度财报是决定其股价是否有更大上涨空间的关键因素。【原文：Rubrik Inc.’s third-quarter results on Thursday are a crucial factor in whether its stock price has more room to run, having already jumped more than 50% since the last release.】

item.title: 维托尔、嘉能可看中新富通公司的牙买加液化天然气资产
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，维托尔集团和嘉能可集团（Glencore Plc.）正在考虑收购新堡垒能源公司（New Fortress Energy Inc.【原文：Vitol Group and Glencore Plc. are considering acquiring New Fortress Energy Inc.’s Jamaican LNG assets, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚亲欧盟政党同意联合抵制极右翼势力
item.description: 罗马尼亚的亲欧洲政党签署了一项组建联盟的协议，试图在周日举行的第二轮总统选举前阻止民族主义势力掌权。【原文：Romania’s pro-European parties signed a deal to form a coalition in an attempt to keep nationalist forces out of power ahead of a presidential election run-off on Sunday that has a Russia-friendly candidate as the front-runner.】

item.title: 高盛寻求私人信贷为 NEOTech 债务再融资
item.description: 据知情人士透露，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）一直在代表电子制造企业 NEOTech 与直接贷款人接触，以帮助其对现有债务进行再融资。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc has been reaching out to direct lenders on behalf of NEOTech, an electronics manufacturing business, to help refinance its existing debt, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普任命万斯助手盖尔-斯莱特为司法部反垄断高级官员
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）已选择牛津大学毕业、曾担任美国当选副总统万斯（JD Vance）经济政策顾问的盖尔-斯莱特（Gail Slater）担任司法部反垄断执法部门负责人。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump has selected Gail Slater, an Oxford-educated economic policy adviser to Vice President-elect JD Vance, to head up antitrust enforcement at the Justice Department.】

item.description: 环球人寿公司（Globe Life Inc.【原文：Globe Life Inc. shares fell after a short seller said its American Income Life unit appears to have shuttered several major offices.】

item.title: 战锤制造商登上英国富时 100 指数，零售商纷纷退出
item.description: 战锤开发商游戏工作室集团公司（Games Workshop Group Plc）和投资信托公司联盟威坦公司（Alliance Witan Plc）的股票飙升至历史新高，首次获得英国蓝筹股地位。【原文：Warhammer developer Games Workshop Group Plc and investment trust Alliance Witan Plc earned UK blue-chip status for the first time after both stocks soared to record highs.】

item.title: 纳格尔称欧洲央行不应将利率降至中性以下
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）认为，欧洲中央银行可以逐步降低借贷成本，使其不再限制经济活动，但不应走得太远。【原文：The European Central Bank can gradually lower its borrowing costs to levels that no longer restrict economic activity but shouldn’t go too far, according to Governing Council member Joachim Nagel.】
